name: Crumbling Tower (rgbds)
description:
You are in a tower. The Exits are closed and the tower is collapsing... But help is on the way! Survive until the counter in the bottom right hits the end.

This game was made to learn more about the gameboy itself, rather than to build a completely polished result. In just a weekend i learned how to use a tracker to make a basic track, how to check for collisions using z80 assembly and some tips for good shading in pixel-art

Shoutouts to:

  • the Lame-jam community
  • Glitched Velocity
  • GBStudio -> for the html-wrapper
  • and you, the player

PS - yep, the title-screen is unrelated
